channel.title: SWAT Team Takes Down a Pair of PS3 Gamers
channel.description:
How awesome is your gaming rig’s sound system? Hopefully it’s a little quieter than that of an unlucky 21-year-old Copenhagen man and his friend. According to a report on QJ.net, the two gamer buddies were playing an unspecified PlayStation 3 title with the sound cranked up to 11. A concerned neighbor called the local gendarmes in the belief that the sound of gunfire coming from next door was the real deal. Perhaps thinking that a full-scale war had broken out, a Danish SWAT team was activated. The cops used a megaphone to order the men to come out and surrender. The noisy gamers wisely put their controllers down without a fight and were arrested on suspicion of mayhem. They were soon released after a search of their apartment uncovered no firearms.
sauce: http://www.gamepolitics.com/2009/01/13/swat-team-takes-down-pair-ps3-gamers Man.. that must be a sweet sound system!

item.title: SWAT Team Takes Down a Pair of PS3 Gamers
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:9, topic:258307”]They would have to kill me before they searched my house. Cuz I’m stubborn like that.

Good thing I have nice neighbors We have a very loud system, I’ve never even tried it at full blast.[/quote]Ours is impossible to “full blast”. It would totally wreck the house (we have successfully made a chair fall over on aprox 30% of the volume)

It would have been cooler if the swat broke into the house and like dove around and shit.

No, it wouldn’t of.

What game was he playing, anyone know?

the game was Rainbow Six Vegas I think

l2read

“I think”.
[/quote]
Closest you will get though ;)[/quote]
Where was this information gotten from? Or was it a wild guess?

item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

You could get a lot of people in trouble with loud noises. You could set up your neighbour up with another “woman” and make it “sound” like hes cheating on his wife.

Do you know whats so scary about this Section. Before I went on MITB I was actualy thinking about posting a blog of news like a jounalist. And now there this Section!

*Fat Cookies is FREAKED out
